body_html:
In case anyone else is looking, I initially got the following, even when doing a 'bazel clean' before building:

:copyNativeLibs FAILED

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':copyNativeLibs'.
> Could not copy file '.../1a4c05cdb2ca1de9a943143330f40f73/execroot/tensorflow/bazel-out/x86-4.9-gnu-libstdcpp-opt/bin/tensorflow/examples/android/libtensorflow_demo.so' to '.../tensorflow/tensorflow/examples/android/libs/x86/libtensorflow_demo.so'.

You have to open permissions on the .so file in the .../tensorflow/tensorflow/examples/android/libs/x86/ directory.

body:
In case anyone else is looking, I initially got the following, even when doing a 'bazel clean' before building:
```
:copyNativeLibs FAILED

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':copyNativeLibs'.
> Could not copy file '.../1a4c05cdb2ca1de9a943143330f40f73/execroot/tensorflow/bazel-out/x86-4.9-gnu-libstdcpp-opt/bin/tensorflow/examples/android/libtensorflow_demo.so' to '.../tensorflow/tensorflow/examples/android/libs/x86/libtensorflow_demo.so'.
```
You have to open permissions on the .so file in the `.../tensorflow/tensorflow/examples/android/libs/x86/`  directory.
